Ext.form.field.HtmlEditor Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.form.field.HtmlEditor Ext.form.HtmlEditor htmleditor form field
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.tip.QuickTipManager.init(); // enable tooltips
    Ext.create('Ext.form.HtmlEditor', {
        width: 580,
        height: 250,
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
